Customer Master Data Team
Your IHS Markit Customer Master Data {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
{!Today()}
Dear {!Case.Contact},
The IHS Markit Customer Master Data Team has completed your request and closed case number {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject "{!Case.Subject}".
If you have any additional questions on your query, please quote the above case reference number when contacting us.
You are invited to take a short SURVEY about your experience with the case. The survey will take less than a minute and will be used by the Customer Master Data team to improve the service you receive.
Click here for the SURVEY
Kind regards, Customer Master Data Team
